ai-patthana10.17:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means pervading the three watches of the night.
ai-patthana10.17:0.3_0: wrapped in the back, and on the backs of the hands.
ai-patthana10.17:1.1_0: You should not give up resentment to someone’s teaching.
ai-patthana10.17:2.1_0: the thirty-two objects of the company ...
ai-patthana10.17:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana10.17:3.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for someone who has gone for refuge to the Buddha, the teaching, or the Saṅgha.
ai-patthana10.17:3.1_2: You don’t give rise to confidence in those without it. Your teaching doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it. ...
ai-patthana10.17:4.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor gives rise to the flood. Consciousness doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana10.17:4.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, or resentment doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-patthana10.17:5.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor gives rise to confidence in those without it. ...
ai-patthana10.17:6.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without moderation, or cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.17:7.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-patthana10.17:8.1_0: the thirty-two objects of the company ...
ai-patthana10.17:9.1_0: Not for the sake of non-decline, nor for the sake of subsistence, nor for the sake of crossing the flood.
ai-patthana10.17:9.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of sustained thought does not give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana10.17:9.1_2: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without consciousness.
ai-patthana10.17:10.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor gives rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana10.17:10.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of sustained thought arises in someone whose mind is no cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.17:10.1_2: Not for the sake of non-greed, nor do he gives rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana10.17:11.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without moderation, or dependently originated the eyes.
ai-patthana10.17:11.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without moderation, or dependently originated the eyes.
ai-patthana10.17:11.1_2: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without moderation, or dependently originated the eyes. Because of this they don’t give rise to the flood by no repulsion, and no cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.17:11.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana10.17:12.1_2: And transgressed with the opposite sex. nine orifices each other.
